name: 陳昭伶
objective: 本課程以國內外新聞時事為教材，訓練學生從新聞的字彙入門，並藉由增加詞彙量與練習重要句型，使學生進而能閱讀與理解英文新聞。教材將選自各類報紙/雜誌或線上新聞中適合中(高)級學生之各類新聞（如政治、經濟、科技、教育、娛樂與旅遊新聞等），以有效提升其基本英文閱聽能力。
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction and policy 
Week 2: Introduction to News English  
Week 3: News Media in Detail 
Week 4: Politics 
Week 5: Day off
Week 6: Economics 
Week 7: Technology 
Week 8: Environment 
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: Quiz
Week 11: Health and Medicine 
Week 12: Sports  
Week 13: Entertainment
Week 14: Travel
Week 15: Education
Week 16: Crime 
Week 17: Happy New Year Day off
Week 18 Quiz
Week 19 Final exam
scorePolicy:
Grades/responsibilities: 
Class Participation & Attendance & Quizzes & Assignments & Presentations: 80% 
School-wide Midterm exam: 20%

Note: Grades/responsibilities: Conscientious class attendance is required. This means
being prepared for class and participating actively and thoughtfully in all class 
discussions and activities. 缺課一次扣總分2分，遲到25分鐘即為缺課。缺課六次以上（含六次），本課程不予計分
